## TripleStore.replace() method

Replaces triple `a` with `b`<!-- -->, \*iff\* `a` is actually in the store. Else does nothing.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
replace(a: Triple, b: Triple): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | <code>Triple</code> |  |
|  b | <code>Triple</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
